1.3.name: wordpress/magento-wordpress-integration
1.3.description:
If you are using this plugin, then you may also be interested in my Magento extension - Single Sign-on for Magento and Wordpress.

Using the Magento WordPress Integration plugin you will be able to add any Magento blocks to your WordPress theme, including ones you have created yourself and static blocks created through the Magento admin area. You can also add any number of Magento products to your WordPress posts and pages, using the shortcode & widget add-on.

You can now show products from a specific Magento category per WordPress category, using the category specifc widget add-on. This is great for content relevant cross-sells.

Sup
